page.title: 11SPARE TIME IN MILVERTON
page.content:
IN MILVERTON THERE ARE 2 SKITTLE ALLEYS. ONE IS AT THE WHITE HART,THE OTHER AT THE GLOBE. THE ONE AT THE WHITE HART WAS BURNT DOWN IN JANUARY 1984. NOW THEY HAVE BUILT IT AGAIN AND IT IS VERY SMART. THERE ARE 9 SKITTLES 3 BALLS AND 1 ALLEY IN EACH PUB. THERE ARE 8 PEOPLE IN EACH TEAM, 7 PEOPLE ROLLING THE BALLS AND THE OTHER ONE STANDING BEHIND THE SKITTLES TO SEND THE BALLS BACK AND PICK UP THE SKITTLES. THE GLOBE AND THE WHITE HART ARE THE ONLY PUBS IN MILVERTON.
APART FROM PLAYING SKITTLES, SOME PEOPLE GO TO THE MARKET ON SATURDAYS. THE MARKET IS HELD IN THE VICTORIA ROOMS. IT IS A BUSY MARKET AND IT SELLS LOTS OF CLOTHES. MILVERTON HAD FORTY EVENTS IN JUNE. JUNE WAS A VERY BUSY MONTH FOR MILVERTON.
